project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file and counts the frequency of each word, displaying the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement the function to read a text file and process its content.
Implement the logic to count the frequency of each word.
Implement the logic to sort and retrieve the top 10 most common words.
Write tests to verify the functionality of all implemented features.
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly.
